```{r statistic_exploration_1}

meAnalysis <- read.delim(paste0(wd,'gene_functional_mutations_functional_switches.txt'))

f <- apply(meAnalysis[,colnames(meAnalysis) %in% c("ms","m","s","n")],1, function(x){
    f <- fisher.test(x=matrix(x+1,nrow=2,ncol=2),alternative="less")
    c(p=f$p.value,or=f$estimate)} )

f.df <- as.data.frame(t(f))
colnames(f.df) <- c("p_me","OR_me")

pp <- cbind(meAnalysis,f.df)


```
